接口的使用
javax.websocket.SendHandler

  • 使用SendHandler的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    javax.websocket  
    org.apache.tomcat.websocket  
    org.apache.tomcat.websocket.server
    Server-side specific implementation classes.

    • javax.websocket中SendHandler的使用

      参数类型为SendHandler的javax.websocket中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void RemoteEndpoint.Async.sendBinary(java.nio.ByteBuffer data, SendHandler completion)
      Send the message asynchronously, using the SendHandler to signal to the client when the message has been sent.
      void RemoteEndpoint.Async.sendObject(java.lang.Object obj, SendHandler completion)
      Encodes object as a message and sends it asynchronously, using the SendHandler to signal to the client when the message has been sent.
      void RemoteEndpoint.Async.sendText(java.lang.String text, SendHandler completion)
      Send the message asynchronously, using the SendHandler to signal to the client when the message has been sent.
